name: Detached (itch) (adszads)
description:
In detached you play as a lonely spaceship, deserted by its fleet, which finds itself in the solar system of an ancient alien race. Hack into their systems by solving puzzles and blast through their dusty defences to find what caused their downfall.

Made in 11 days for the Major Jam: Isolation.

Font: monogram

Music: Creo (Memory and Showdown cut into loops)
